about_the_game:
There is a mysterious sea area at the end of the world. Only free and unruly souls can reach it. The world calls it the "unknown place". It is said that there are 72 heart islands. Protected and built by powerful and free island owners; It is said that there is a sea of souls. Players will break the boundaries of time and space, share the same interests, resonate with each other, depend on each other, and warm each other.
Here is a world embracing freedom and warmth. Players, as island owners, can build their own beautiful islands at will; You can also become friends with souls from afar, pacify their wandering hearts, and build a new home for them; You can also become friends with other players to build your town.

1. Free dressing and creation
We will provide a 10000 square meter adiy area, where you can plant crops, collect resources and build your own town; You can also use bridges and ramps to design highlands, rivers and waterfalls to create a beautiful garden world. We will provide a variety of theme buildings and furniture, whether Italian towns, or Chinese classical gardens, or modern retro cities, can be designed at will.

2. Multi person online joint exploration
We are an online game. We will allow players to open up wasteland, cultivate land and build on the island together; You can also dive and fly together to explore the secrets of the world and discover hidden treasures. Therefore, our game is very suitable for couples or family members to play together.

3. Encounter strangers with similar interests
We will have a beautiful "world tree". Players can reveal their feelings through the "tree hole" and match with strangers with similar interests. You can overcome the barriers of time and space, establish contacts in the game, and cultivate intimacy to become intimate partners. Friends can exchange their rare products and help each other build their own islands.

4. Rich and interesting business contacts
We will build a complex and interesting "futures market" into the game. Players can play their intelligence, buy and sell constantly, and become the richest player in this virtual time, just like in reality. We award them medals and rare drawings and materials in the game.
